title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Filter\Builder\OffsetFilter
name: OffsetFilter
description: A builder used to configure offset based filters.

methods.name: cellsPerRow
methods.description: Skips the first N cells of each row, matching all subsequent cells. If duplicate cells are present, as is possible when using an Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Filter\InterleaveFilter, each copy of the cell is counted separately.
